TITLE_SOCIAL_SHARING: Hello, I'm really enjoying Leaf - Sons to relax and sleep. Join us! :)

TABS.FREQUENCIA_RECONEXAO: Frequency of Reconnection with the Creative Source

FRASES.FRASE: The law of the mind is relentless. What you think, you create; What you feel, you attract; What you believe comes true.
Do not allow others to take away your peace. The peace comes from inside yourself. Don't look around you.
We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts we make our world.
Always turn your face towards the sun, and then the shadows will be left behind.
The difficulties are like the mountains. They only flatten out when we move over them.
When it rains, look for the rainbow. When it gets dark, look for the stars.
Don't wait for the perfect moment. Make every moment the perfect opportunity.
Winners are not people who never fail, they are people who never give up.
The best way to be happy is to contribute to the happiness of others.
Live the story you would like to tell.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance you need to keep moving.
Motivation is what helps you get started. Habit is what keeps you going.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now!
When you wake up in the morning, think of the precious privilege of being alive, breathing, thinking, enjoying and loving.
Fall in love with its existence.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
From a small seed, a powerful tree can be born.
We can't control the wind, just adjust the sails.
Your heart is full of seeds waiting to germinate.
Loving yourself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
The one who laughs instead of getting angry is always the strongest.
It is easier to overcome a bad habit today than it is tomorrow.
When you see a good man, try to imitate him; when you see a bad man, examine yourself.
At the bottom of each soul are hidden treasures that only love allows to discover.
Kindness is the purest form of charity.
If there is no wind, paddle.
Don't limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
Try to move the world - the first step will be to move yourself.
A long trip starts with a single step.
